name: Disruptive Aura
description: Turn on the sound! Disruptive Aura makes reference to the theory that music is apprehended from the world of ideas and represented by musical scores, and also to the advancement of contemporary art against this type of metaphysics, by presenting a work that resists musical representation, given that it is organically constructed in the here and now. The golden color of the frame refers to the history of art and the deification of traditional art, and the frame composed of frame pieces refers to the fragmentation of contemporary art. Frames assemblage by Rodrigo Cid; Digital art and music by Blu Simon Wasen.
